channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Google Quietly Prepares Major iPhone Feature Boost For Pixel 9
item.description: Leaked Android Canary files reveal Google is bringing the iPhone’s "AirDrop" compatibility to the Pixel 9.

item.title: Thoughts On Job Displacement With AI
item.description: AI and robots may upend jobs by 2040, worsening inequality; history suggests new work emerges, but it’s unseen today.

item.title: Bungie Asks What’s Wrong With Destiny 2’s Season Passes
item.description: Bungie is asking for feedback about the current state of season passes in Destiny 2, and I am happy to share my thoughts here.

item.title: ‘Fortnite’ Players Angry At Steal The Brainrot’s $20 Loot Boxes, Gambling Wheel
item.description: Steal the Brainrot, one of Fortnite's biggest creative maps, is now charging a ton of money for loot boxes and gambling-like slot machines.

item.title: 2026 Commerce Predictions, According To Top Venture Capitalists
item.description: 2026 Commerce predictions from top venture capitalists

item.title: “Leave yourself an out”

item.title: Not trying very hard

item.title: Make and take
item.description: In a world of automation, AI and outsourcing, what exactly do we do for a living? Perhaps we make decisions. And what’s in short supply? A willingness...
